Reviews.Title: “good place with poor facility”
Reviews.Author: abtin z
Reviews.Content: stayed st george 4 staffvery breakfast thanks liza facility night cold

Reviews.Title: “just a 3 stars hotel”

Reviews.Content: raising expectations bec beginning 3 star hotel gf met holiday arrived told reservation upgraded junior suite plus am satisfied reception staff april nice helped fine wide kettle tea coffee hair dryer weight scale fridge tv ironing board request window maintenance guy fixed called roomservice hotel advantage meaning view dubai creek 400m al metro station advantage title 3 star hotel expecting disadvantages mainly night club 10th floor stayed third floor honestly noisy hear beats breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Disapointing”

Reviews.Content: stayed st george 3 nights jam packed itinerary pay expensive hotel sleeping hotel rated 3 star staying fairly decent hotel looked trip advisor travelled dubai advice people requested near ground floor night club top floor despite located floor hear music apparent ladies night frequented nightclub upstairs personally bother girls approach friendly lift understandably offend people smoking hotel entire hotel smelt stale tobacco moved onto bangkok dubai smell hung clothes believed air conditioning sounded leaking damp bed linen clean towels replaced daily despite claims hotel dirty dated price thar paid hotel expecting luxurious expect basic clean breakfast included price bothered day choice breakfast cereal tasted stale coissants st george loacted walking distance souks excellent view creek water taxis otherside creek bur dubai sell clothing etc lot cheaper souks st george located deira personally preferred jumeriah modern dubai aware hotels doubt expensive dubai husband wished paid bit extra standard hotel
